title: pODi pODi ahankAri nI pullAnkuzhal Udum
sahitya:
pODi pODi ahankAri nI pullAnkuzhal Udum nanda kumAranin pOkkum varavum arivEnaDi pODi


anupallavi

  kuDi koDutta shuDark-kOdai avaL shonna vazhi irukkip-pOdai avaL pADik-koDutta 
tiruppAvai paravasham AghiDa vazhi onrirukkudu pAraDi un dayavENaDi pODi


caraNam    vazhi shollaDi onru enrAl vAyAl vandapaDi pazhi shollurAi azhagi shamattiyArum 
nighar illAdavaL enru aDikkaDi tannai meccik-koLLurAi shuzhiccu ettanai adu 
pOTTAlum pUjyam shollik-koLLu tannait-tAnE mamataiyin rAjyam vizhiccadu 
rAhukAlam veDinjadu dAcciyam vEdanEyil unnai sholla Edu yOgyam pODi
